creator: stephan@vern.chem.tu-berlin.de
text:
I couldn't compile the webdav server.

main:
     [echo] Building Slide Core API
    [javac] Compiling 204 source files to
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/classes
     [copy] Copying 2 files to /home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/classes
     [copy] Copying 7 files to /home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/lib
     [echo] Building Standard Stores
    [javac] Compiling 21 source files to
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/classes
     [echo] Building Default Roles
    [javac] Compiling 6 source files to
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/classes
     [echo] Building Slide WebDAV Servlet
    [javac] Compiling 104 source files to
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/build/classes
    [javac]
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/src/webdav/server/org/apache/slide/webdav/util/XMLValue.java:281:
Exception java.io.IOException is never thrown in the body of the corresponding
try statement.
    [javac]             catch (IOException e) {
    [javac]             ^
    [javac] Note:
/home/stephan/local/jakarta-slide/src/webdav/server/org/apache/slide/webdav/logger/XHttpServletResponseWrapper.java
uses or overrides a deprecated API.  Recompile with "-deprecation" for details.
    [javac] 1 error, 1 warning

creator: stephan@vern.chem.tu-berlin.de
text:
Created attachment 2220
Diff file for XMLValue.java

creator: cmlenz@apache.org
text:
The compile error is caused by a dependancy on the latest development version of
JDOM, which has not yet been released.

See:
http://nagoya.apache.org/eyebrowse/ReadMsg?listName=slide-dev@jakarta.apache.org&msgNo=4616
and:
http://nagoya.apache.org/eyebrowse/ReadMsg?listName=slide-dev@jakarta.apache.org&msgNo=4619

The dev version of JDOM is in CVS, and you should point your ${jdom.jar}
property to that ./lib/jdom-dev.jar.
